title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled, indicating that they cannot be used to scroll.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only). 2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 3. Note that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around, but they do not have any effect. 4. Open a small image, such as an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading, as they do not perform any scrolling.
